name: R'LYEH ASSAULT
description:
Experience hot blinking action, in a brand new LOVECRAFTIAN TALE of uncanny terror! Destroy the All-Mighty CTHULHU, using the powers of the LEGENDARY NECRONOMICON , and free the fishing town of R'LYEH of his power and his DAGON minions. Will you save R'LYEH from CTHULU'S betentacled grasp, or will you lose your sanity in the process?
AAAAAAA


Tips:
-Keep Your Eyes Shut as much as possible

-Cthulhu has learned to teleport

CONTROLS

-WASD: Movement

-Right click: close eyes

-Left click: book magic

-Space: jump up

-F1: review tutorial message

Attributions:
Created by Blood Machine
Made using @BreoganHackett 's (utterly amazing) retro FPS controller
